titleInfo.title: Nashville Songwriters Association International's Legislative Show (March 11, 2008)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color lobby card (pink and green on light yellow) announcing the Nashville Songwriters Association International's Legislative Show featuring Roxie Dean, Jamie O'Neal, Kylie Sackley, and Leslie Satcher at the Bluebird Cafe on March 11. Proceeds from the event go towards NSAI's Legislative efforts, which support the rights of songwriters everywhere. Poster features woodcuts of stars.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
